document_data.name: The Whirlpool
document_data.mainbody: '''The Whirlpool''' was a former festhall, turned restaurant and theater, in the [[aquatic elf]] city of [[Myth Nantar]].
document_data.Location: This building stood in the [[Myth Nantar/Law Quarter|Law Quarter]] of Myth Nantar.
document_data.Structure: The Whirlpool stood six stories tall.
document_data.Services: In addition to serving food, the Whirlpool put on nightly dance and [[opera]] performances. Often times [[whale]]s sang along to the the singing of the establishment's [[mermaid]] and sea elf divas.
document_data.Reputation: The Whirlpool had a reputation in Myth Nantar for being one of the premier places to go in the city for food and theater, with some saying that no other establishment in the city served better food.
